QuestData.Title: The Direct Solution
QuestData.Description: Alright $n, this is the second time we've had to deal with ravaging hozen. I think it's time we take care of this problem the Huojin way. No more patience. No more mediation. We go to the source.$B$BWe're going into the hozen village to the north and we're punishing those smelly troublemakers. I've been looking forward to a chance to fight by your side again, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Invigorating! A good fight always makes me feel better!
